title: Dom Juan
brief_description:
The central character of Dom Juan is the anti-hero, a brilliant, irresponsible villain, an amourous libertine who receives his comeuppance by refusing to repent.

Credits: Director, Marcel Bluwal ; photography, Andre Bac ; music, Mozart.
Cast: Claude Brasseur, Michel Piccoli, Anouk Ferjac, Dominique Rosan, Michel Le Royer.
